name: Arise (itch)
description:
if you get an error saying "Adobe Flash is required to run this project in the browser," then try this link:
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/646556

Play the sequel here!
https://alexclay.itch.io/arise-2

Jump on walls and evade a volcano's wrath!
------------

*Game saves progress automatically!*

Left Right / A D ----- Move
Space ---------------- Jump, Restart
- + --------------------- Change Volume

(Fullscreen can severely slow down game!)
------------

A legend tells of an island of flightless birds. Said birds are required to do a sacrifice. Each year, they throw one unlucky bird into the "Abyss" to spare the others from damnation. It is told that a bird may climb out and break the island's curse. This is not the story of the one who succeeds. This is the story of the ones who fail.
